frameset.edef: to ring , to cause to make a sound of a bell

example.parse: (S (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الآن))) (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لن)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يرن) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الهاتف)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S يخرج) (PP (PREP من) (NP (PRON_3MS ه))) (NP-SBJ (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_NOM صوت)) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM دافئ) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الإيمان)))) (PUNC ,) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM متدفق) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الشلال)))) (PUNC ,) (ADJP (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_NOM مجروح) (PP (PREP ك) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN كرامة) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الامة))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: so that will sound like a warm voice full of faith like a waterfall, injured like the dignity of the nation

arg.g: inside the belly of a cow
